Text: OASIS Phase II Business IssuesTO OASIS SCHEDULING COLLABORATIVE NERC ROSTER STANDARDS LISTSERVER OPERATING MANUAL OWNERS SYSTEMS OPERATOR TRAINERS This is a REMINDER that the deadline for public comment on the above is Monday June Please submit your comments no later than COB Ladies and Gentlemen The Electronic Scheduling Collaborative ESC is seeking comments from all interested parties on proposed OASIS Business Practices and issues related to OASIS Phase II The ESCs goal is to file with the FERC the Standardized Business Practices that are necessary to support the implementation of OASIS Phase II as required by the FERC ANOPR Docket No RM These standardized business practices will be filed with the FERC on August This summer the ESC will conduct three rounds of public comment postings This is the first posting and will run from May through June The ESC will compile and respond in general to the comments The ESC responses to the comments will be posted with revisions to the documents at the next round of public postings The next two postings are tentatively scheduled for June and July The above referenced documents are available for review and comment on the NERC web site wwwnerccom From NERC Fast Links select OASIS Phase II Business Issues Please read the Business Issues Summary document before commenting Comments will only be accepted on the comment form provided
